<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Creates binary descriptor for the given device images. Binary descriptor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is an object that is passed to the offloading runtime at program startup</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and it describes all device images available in the executable or shared</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">/// library. It is defined as follows</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#95;&#95;attribute&#95;&#95;((visibility(&quot;hidden&quot;)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extern &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#42;&#95;&#95;start&#95;omp&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#95;&#95;attribute&#95;&#95;((visibility(&quot;hidden&quot;)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extern &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#42;&#95;&#95;stop&#95;omp&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create the register globals function. We will iterate all of the offloading</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment">/// entries stored at the begin / end symbols and register them according to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment">/// their type. This creates the following function in IR:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extern struct &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#95;&#95;start&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extern struct &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#95;&#95;stop&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extern void &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterFunction(void &#42;&#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, int,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="comment">///                                    void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, int &#42;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extern void &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterVar(void &#42;&#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, int32&#95;t,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment">///                               int64&#95;t, int32&#95;t, int32&#95;t);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="comment">/// void &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterTest(void &#42;&#42;fatbinHandle) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="comment">///   for (struct &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#42;entry = &amp;&#95;&#95;start&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="comment">///        entry != &amp;&#95;&#95;stop&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries; ++entry) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="comment">///     if (entry-&gt;Kind != OFK&#95;CUDA)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="comment">///       continue</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="comment">///     if (!entry-&gt;Size)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="comment">///       &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterFunction(fatbinHandle, entry-&gt;addr, entry-&gt;name,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="comment">///                              entry-&gt;name, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="comment">///     else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">///       &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterVar(fatbinHandle, entry-&gt;addr, entry-&gt;name, entry-&gt;name,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">///                         0, entry-&gt;size, 0, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-offloadwrapper-cpp-/#aa95d3be8182edf7e68419d38f31dc9de"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-offloadwrapper-cpp-/#aa95d3be8182edf7e68419d38f31dc9de">createRegisterGlobalsFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsHIP,</Highlight></CodeLine>
